titles: Greene in conceipt New raised from his graue to write the tragique historie of faire Valeria of London. Wherein is truly discouered the rare and lamentable issue of a husbands dotage, a wiues leudnesse, & children of disobedience. Receiued and reported by I.D.
author: Dickenson, John, romance writer.
Greene, Robert, 1558?-1592.
publisher: By Richard Bradocke for William Iones, dwelling at the signe of the Gunne neare Holborne conduit,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
